title: Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Using Mobile Learning in Remote Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Support for a flexible learning environment using personal mobile devices, with continuous feedback provided through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply math problem-solving strategies with at least 80% accuracy without spatiotemporal constraints using mobile devices.
Learners conduct collaborative learning with peers through online discussion forums and mobile apps at least 70% of the time.
Learners achieve weekly learning goals at least 90% of the time using an LMS and mobile-integrated system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
